snippet.title: Demo Trailer - Steam Next Fest 2023: Play for Free October 9 to 16
snippet.description:
Play the entire demo for free only during Steam Next Fest October 2023.
The demo, a very small portion of the current game, includes the character creator and the first Sword Blossom arc which focuses on the Engineering department aboard the FHS Justice and their quiet struggle against the Promethean menace and the evil Dr. Cornish. The arc contains seven missions, culminating in an intense battle to protect the FHS Justice and its inhabitants from assimilation. 
The character creator customization options in Ship of Heroes are the best of any MMORPG. Complex and unusual game mechanics keep the game varied, interesting, and challenging. Housing, harvesting, crafting, and trading are included in the game.
Ship of Heroes is a superhero sci-fi MMORPG with an original story. In the 25th century, you are defending humanity as a citizen on the Free Human Ship Justice, a 20 miles-long generation ship traveling the galaxy. Players start their journey on the first ship level, which includes Apotheosis City and the Engineering levels. Magic co-exists with advanced technology.
